quiz.question: Mrs. Maria is on the line and says 'my neighbor receives offers on her cell phone and I don't'. How should you guide her to join the service safely and officially?
quiz.opt_a: A) 'Mrs. Maria, please give me your number and I will register you right now in the system.'
quiz.opt_b: B) 'You must select your preferred store and access the community through the official link or QR Code.'
quiz.opt_c: C) 'Ask your neighbor to add you to her group, it's easier.'
quiz.opt_d: D) 'This service has been temporarily suspended, follow only via the website.'
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! The customer must actively join via Link or QR Code for the specific store.
